name: The Gatherer
credits:
MappyTheKat - Character art
Jedi - RUS translation
description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character with 75 cards, 6 relics.

v0.7.0 - v0.7.3 (2019-01-27 ~ 2019-01-28)
- 2 new cards, 1 new relic, 1 card removed (Grass Knot)
- Fixed bug where where Potion Sack was not visible when you play as certain characters(ex. Playable Snecko)
- New art for some cards.
- Balance changes
- Various text improvements (Scent of Rosmari, Lucky Clover, more for KOR)

v0.7.3 (2019-01-29)
- REVERT: Scent of Rosmari now retains the chosen card again. Sorry for Scent of Rosmari + Scroll of Wall fans.
- The lesser potions you get from random generation effects does not change when save & load.
- Fixed bug where Mind Search was deleted.
- Internal change to allow Mind Search to search crossover lesser potions. (e.g. Jedi Mod)

v0.7.4 (2019-01-30)
- Fixed crash when you have powers like Feel no Pain or Dark Embrace and exhaust Statuses with Scroll of Wall.

Visit https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/1611788501 for full change notes.
